Posts.Title: 20% off Solidea Compression Garment KS1 SueC10

Posts.Content: Sep 25, 2012 12:34PM SueC10 wrote: Hi hugz4u.  I too deal with the same issues as many of you and agree there are no real solutions at the moment.  For me, I alternate between the Advanced Micro Massage Bilateral Sleeve (which helps stimulate my superficial lymphatic capillaries) and the Therapeutic Unilateral Arm Sleeve 23/32 mmHg to move fluid trapped in my tissues into the deeper part of my system. I also wear Solidea's Advanced Micro Massage high waist short with a Memoi Shaping cami over it to address fluid trapped in my trunk.  I am working with Solidea to create garments that can address truncal lymphedema and advocating for higher compression but sometime progress is a bit slow. However, know I will not give up trying to have garments made that will help all of us. I have spent the last two years working with patients, therapists and doctors to understand the unique qualities offered by Solidea garments. From all the research, we now have a greater understanding of these garments and how they can affect change overtime.
Posts.Title: 20% off Solidea Compression Garment KS1 SueC10

Posts.Content: Sep 24, 2012 08:01PM SueC10 wrote: Thanks KS1 for the post.  I was told about this discussion board and thought I would take a look. I am from LSC and as a survivor dealing with lymphedema, I thought I would say hello and offer my services. I found Solidea and believe in my heart they offer a very different approach to helping us deal with this condition. I am here to help answer any questions you may have.
